parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value> <comment><!-- First mentioned in TOH patch notes. --></comment>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns ammo count of assigned magazine.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[gearSlotAmmoCount]] control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - CT_ITEMSLOT 103

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>ammo = [[gearSlotAmmoCount]] _control;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[gearSlotData]], [[gearIDCAmmoCount]]
</value></part></template>
